title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The sword and a helmet which had also belonged to the hero are now in the possession  of Lord Elgin, who represents the family of Bruce, and are to be seen at Broomhall, near Dunfermline.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Close by the village of Charleston, on the north side of the Forth, stands Broomhall, the seat of the Earl of Elgin.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The bed in which he was born is preserved in Broomhall, the seat of the Earl of Elgin, two miles from the town.
